price: Kweli ikathibiti na yakabat'ilika waliyo kuwa wakiyatenda.
arabic: فَوَقَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Basi Haki ikathibiti na kudhihiri upande wa Musa a.s. na ukabwatika udanganyifu wa wachawi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fawaqaʿa al-ḥaqu wabaṭala mā kānū yaʿmalūna
